description: What happens when you merge high-end professional photography and over thirty years of cinematography expertise? A fun, upbeat and downright captivating guide to capturing life's moments as they unfold naturally, through (better) photography! Tamara shares her unique approach to photography in this comprehensive guide to techniques for taking better photos at home or on-the-go, in peaceful settings or during life's chaotic, action-packed moments.
title: Capturing Life Through (Better) Photography
